tooltip.loopingMode.label: Choose what happens after the last frame
tooltip.loopingMode.select: Looping mode: use GIF setting, loop forever, or stop at the end
tooltip.loopingMode.source: Follow the GIF file's original loop count
tooltip.loopingMode.infinite: Always restart at frame 1 after the last frame
tooltip.loopingMode.none: Stop playback when the last frame is reached
tooltip.playbackSpeed.label: Adjust playback speed relative to the GIF timing
warning.largeGifReducedMode: Large GIF detected. Reduced mode is on (throttled preview). Use looping mode to control looping
